LEGEND.LVLA: The required mobility time is max. 35% of the local average.
LEGEND.LVLB: The required mobility time is between 36% and 50% of the local average.
LEGEND.LVLC: The required mobility time is between 51% and 71% of the local average.
LEGEND.LVLD: The required mobility time is between 72% and 100% of the local average.
LEGEND.LVLE: The required mobility time is between 101% and 140% of the local average.
LEGEND.LVLF: The required mobility time is at least 141% of the local average.

TUTORIAL.CLICK_TO_CONTINUE: Click on the highlighted element to continue

DASHBOARD.NAME: Welcome Tutorial
DASHBOARD.DESCRIPTION: Learn the main features of the application

STEP1.TITLE: Welcome!
STEP1.CONTENT: Welcome to mobi.mapr! This short tutorial will show you the main features of the tool. You can skip the tutorial at any time and restart it later. To restart, click the yellow 'i' in the bottom right and then click the top button.
STEP1.NEXT_HINT: Click the button in the bottom center to start.

STEP2.TITLE: Project Overview
STEP2.CONTENT: Here you can find various precomputed maps. Further down, you will find the projects you created yourself.

STEP3.TITLE: View Map
STEP3.CONTENT: To view a map, click the small icon. Depending on the size of the map, it may take a few seconds to load.
STEP3.NEXT_HINT: Click the button in the bottom center to start.

STEP4.TITLE: The Map
STEP4.CONTENT: In the center is the map showing mobility quality. You can zoom to get different resolutions. You can start exploring right after the tutorial.
STEP4.NEXT_HINT: Click the button in the bottom center to continue.

STEP5.TITLE: The Legend
STEP5.CONTENT: In the bottom left, you'll see the legend. Click on it to see what the different colors mean.
STEP5.NEXT_HINT: Click on the legend to see what the different colors mean.

STEP6.TITLE: Show Details
STEP6.CONTENT: Here you'll find all project-related information such as activities, personas, and modes. You can also switch map weighting or export the map here.
STEP6.NEXT_HINT: Click on the details to see more information.

STEP7.TITLE: Analyze Map
STEP7.CONTENT: Clicking on an area of the map will show you detailed information about how the score is composed.
STEP7.NEXT_HINT: Click on a colored area on the map.

STEP8.TITLE: Focus on Map
STEP8.CONTENT: To return to the map, click the close icon in the top right.
STEP8.NEXT_HINT: Click on the close icon in the top right to return to the map.

STEP9.TITLE: Show Projects
STEP9.CONTENT: Click on 'Projects' on the left to view all projects again.
STEP9.NEXT_HINT: Click on the 'Projects' on the left to view all projects again.

STEP10.TITLE: More Information
STEP10.CONTENT: In the bottom right, you can get more information about the application, set the language, view keyboard shortcuts, and restart this tutorial.

STEP11.TITLE: Have Fun!
STEP11.CONTENT: We hope you enjoyed the tutorial and have lots of fun with mobi.mapr!
STEP11.NEXT_HINT: You can end the tutorial at the bottom.

SHARE.NAME: Share
SHARE.DESCRIPTION: Learn the main features of sharing
SHARE.LANGUAGE_HINT: You can change the language in the top right corner!

STEP1.TITLE: Welcome!
STEP1.CONTENT: Welcome to mobi.mapr! This short tutorial will show you the key features of your shared map.
STEP1.NEXT_HINT: Click the button in the bottom center to start.

STEP2.TITLE: The Map
STEP2.CONTENT: In the center is the map showing mobility quality. You can zoom to get different resolutions. You can start exploring right after the tutorial.
STEP2.NEXT_HINT: Click the button in the bottom center to continue.

STEP3.TITLE: The Legend
STEP3.CONTENT: In the bottom left, you'll see the legend. Click on it to see what the different colors mean.

STEP3-1.TITLE: Overview
STEP3-1.CONTENT: You can close the legend at any time by clicking on it again.
STEP3-1.NEXT_HINT: Click somewhere on the legend to close it.

STEP4.TITLE: Show Details
STEP4.CONTENT: Here you'll find all project-related information such as activities, personas, and modes.

STEP5.TITLE: Analyze Map
STEP5.CONTENT: Clicking on an area of the map will show you detailed information about how the score is composed.
STEP5.NEXT_HINT: Click on a colored area on the map.

STEP6.TITLE: Focus on Map
STEP6.CONTENT: To return to the map, click the close icon in the top right.
STEP6.NEXT_HINT: Click on the close icon in the top right to return to the map.

STEP7.TITLE: More Information
STEP7.CONTENT: In the bottom right, you can get more information about the application, like showing the keyboard shortcuts.

STEP8.TITLE: Have Fun!
STEP8.CONTENT: We hope you enjoyed the tutorial and have lots of fun with mobi.mapr!
STEP8.NEXT_HINT: You can end the tutorial at the bottom.
